title: HPI Spencer
content: The patient is a woman here for reevaluation following completion of chemotherapy for lymphoma. She reports increased numbness and tingling in her right hand, which has been worsening over time. She states she has been staying home more due to her recent treatment and notes that she recently burned her right thumb, which has further impaired her ability to feel objects and perform tasks such as putting on earrings. She has been minimizing phone use as a result. The symptoms have progressed to the point where she now requires evaluation and treatment. She has a history of a prior injection in the right small finger in 2015 and is requesting another injection today.
